actions.name: Slush Rush
actions.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Snowy Weather. The user is immune to the negative effects of Snowy Weather.

system.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Snowy Weather. The user is immune to the negative effects of Snowy Weather.
